hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'It is not permissible to give charity to a rich man (or one who is independent of means) or to one who is strong and healthy

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا لَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ دَرَاهِمُ وَكَانَ لَهُ عِدْلُهَا
chapter.eng-name: If He Does Not Have Any Dirhams But He Has The Equivalent
